org.apache.storm.security.auth.authorizer

クラス DenyAuthorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.security.auth.authorizer.DenyAuthorizer
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    IAuthorizer

    public class DenyAuthorizer
extends Object
implements IAuthorizer

    An authorization implementation that denies everything, for testing purposes

      • prepare

        public void prepare(Map conf)

        Invoked once immediately after construction

        定義:
        prepare インタフェース内 IAuthorizer
        パラメータ:

      • permit

        public boolean permit(ReqContext context,
                      String operation,
                      Map topology_conf)

        permit() method is invoked for each incoming Thrift request

        定義:
        permit インタフェース内 IAuthorizer
        パラメータ:
        context - request context
        operation - operation name
        topology_conf - configuration of targeted topology
        戻り値:
        true if the request is authorized, false if reject
